name: The Sanctuary (Norphirion, Thrasmodyel, OscarMetten, Chriswann, Makkuro, ophespi)
name_original: The Sanctuary (Norphirion, Thrasmodyel, OscarMetten, Chriswann, Makkuro, ophespi)
description:
(French version only)

Fantastic creatures inhabit our world; Naiads, elves, and even vampires live among us. However, these creatures must remain hidden from humans...  And that's where YOU come in! As a rookie Alchemist, your duty is to fulfill the needs and expectations of the magical creatures who frequent your establishment.  Prove to your guild that you are capable of running your very own shop and that you are deserving of the official title of "Alchemist"! Game made in 6 weeks for a first year final project at the E-Artsup Nantes school. The Sanctuary Team: [PROGRAMMERS] • Oscar METTEN • Erwann ROUILLARD [ARTISTS] • Tangui MAHEO (Also worked on Game and Narrative Design) • Louise HUTEAU • Ophélie ESPIEGLE • Marla WEIBEL [COMPOSER] • Victor KRYWICKI [PRODUCER] • Antoine BOULAY -  (Also worked on Game and Narrative Design) Thanks Yann2bis for the dub ♥
